docs.snippet: The latest sign of growing unease over the valuations of some richly priced companies has emerged with Snapchat being discounted 25 percent by Fidelity, the mutual fund giant....
docs.lead_paragraph: The latest sign of growing unease over the valuations of some richly priced companies has emerged with Snapchat being discounted 25 percent by Fidelity, the mutual fund giant.
docs.abstract: Mutual funds have discounted worth of several hot ticket technology start-ups, offering sign of growing unease over soaring valuations; Fidelity's 25 percent devaluation of Snapchat and Black Rock's devaluation of Dropbox highlight how mutual funds that inflate prices of companies in first place can affect them negatively later on.

headline.main: Dizzying Ride May Be Ending for Tech Start-Ups
headline.print_headline: Dizzying Ride May Be Ending for Start-Ups

docs.snippet: Tax-filing season is turning into a nightmare for thousands of employees whose companies have been duped by email fraudsters. A major phishing scheme has tricked several major companies — among them, the messaging service Snapchat and disk-d...
docs.lead_paragraph: Tax-filing season is turning into a nightmare for thousands of employees whose companies have been duped by email fraudsters. A major phishing scheme has tricked several major companies — among them, the messaging service Snapchat and disk-drive maker Seagate Technology — into relinquishing tax documents that exposed their workers' incomes, addresses and Social Security numbers.

headline.main: Snapchat, Seagate Among Companies Duped in Tax-Fraud Scam
headline.print_headline: Snapchat, Seagate Among Companies Duped in Tax-Fraud Scam

docs.snippet: Messaging app Snapchat said on Wednesday it has cut a number of jobs in New York and Los Angeles responsible for pulling together user-generated content in its local stories section, as the company shifts its focus to covering bigger events like a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Messaging app Snapchat said on Wednesday it has cut a number of jobs in New York and Los Angeles responsible for pulling together user-generated content in its local stories section, as the company shifts its focus to covering bigger events like award shows and sports.

headline.main: Snapchat Cuts Several Curator Positions in New York and LA

docs.snippet: Platforms like Twitter and Vine are helping make TV more communal, increasing the likelihood that programs are watched when they are broadcast....
docs.lead_paragraph: Platforms like Twitter and Vine are helping make TV more communal, increasing the likelihood that programs are watched when they are broadcast.
docs.abstract: Social media platforms like Twitter and Vine are allowing viewers, as well as cast and crews, to discuss television shows during their broadcasts; trend is helping to revive sense of community that had been lost with private viewing of DVDs and on-demand services.

headline.main: Social Media Takes Television Back in Time
